statements: SELECT * FROM AuditTrailInfo;
SELECT event_id, timestamp, decision_made FROM AuditTrailInfo;
SELECT system_id, confidence_level FROM AuditTrailInfo;
SELECT decision_made, system_id FROM AuditTrailInfo ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM AuditTrailInfo WHERE confidence_level > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM AuditTrailInfo WHERE system_id = 1;
SELECT event_id, timestamp, decision_made FROM AuditTrailInfo WHERE confidence_level > 0.8;
SELECT event_id, timestamp, decision_made, confidence_level FROM AuditTrailInfo WHERE system_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_id, timestamp, decision_made FROM AuditTrailInfo WHERE confidence_level BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.7 ORDER BY event_id ASC;
SELECT event_id, timestamp, system_id FROM AuditTrailInfo WHERE decision_made LIKE '%approved%' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM audit_trail;
SELECT decision, timestamp FROM audit_trail WHERE audit_id = 1;
SELECT system_name FROM trading_systems WHERE system_type = 'Financial';
SELECT system_id, system_name FROM trading_systems ORDER BY system_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_trail WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM audit_trail WHERE audit_id = 1;
SELECT decision, timestamp FROM audit_trail WHERE decision = 'approved' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT system_id AS ID, system_name AS Name, system_type AS Type FROM trading_systems WHERE system_id > 100 ORDER BY system_id ASC;
SELECT system_name, COUNT(*) AS TotalCount FROM trading_systems GROUP BY system_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM audit_trail JOIN trading_systems ON audit_trail.audit_id = trading_systems.system_id WHERE audit_trail.decision = 'rejected' AND trading_systems.system_type = 'Algorithmic';
SELECT * FROM audit_trail_table;
SELECT system_id, system_name FROM trading_systems ORDER BY system_name DESC;
SELECT model_name, accuracy FROM ml_models WHERE accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT system_name, implementation_language FROM trading_systems WHERE system_id = 2;
SELECT model_id, model_name, trained_on FROM ml_models ORDER BY trained_on DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_trail_table ORDER BY timestamp DESC, decision ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT system_id, system_name FROM trading_systems WHERE implementation_language = 'Python';
SELECT model_id, model_name, accuracy FROM ml_models WHERE accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM trading_systems JOIN ml_models ON trading_systems.system_id = ml_models.model_id WHERE trained_on > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM audit_trail_table WHERE decision LIKE '%approved%' OR decision LIKE '%rejected%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_trail;
SELECT action, action_timestamp FROM user_actions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT system_name, description FROM trading_systems ORDER BY system_name DESC;
SELECT asset_name, price FROM trade_records WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY trade_timestamp ASC;
SELECT record_id, trade_type FROM trade_records WHERE trade_type = 'buy' AND price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC, record_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM audit_trail WHERE record_id = 100;
SELECT action_id, user_id, action FROM user_actions WHERE user_id = 10 ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT system_id, system_name, description FROM trading_systems WHERE system_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT record_id, asset_name, trade_type, quantity, price FROM trade_records WHERE quantity > 1000 AND trade_type = 'Buy' ORDER BY trade_timestamp ASC;
SELECT audit_id, timestamp, decision FROM audit_trail WHERE decision LIKE '%approved%' AND timestamp >= '2021-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM audit_trail;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM decision_history WHERE result = 'success';
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM user_activity ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT model_id, value FROM model_performance WHERE metric = 'accuracy' ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT system_id, status FROM trading_system WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM audit_trail ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_trail WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT timestamp, action, user_id FROM audit_trail WHERE action LIKE '%login%' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM audit_trail GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_actions > 5 ORDER BY total_actions DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_activity WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND activity_type LIKE '%click%';
